EmailTemplate.name: SGN_Perrier Jouet_LaPrairie.LaPrairie_RegistrationConfirm (session 2).eDM - Regi
EmailTemplate.subject: Your booking for pampering with La Prairie
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name}}, We look forward to spend a few pampering hours with you and LaPrairie on Friday the 11th March at {{lead.pj_pampering_session}} at the Heeren on Orchard Road. Your Sincerely,
Perrier-Jouët Singapore Can't make it? Please let us know. <[[https://www.google.com.sg/maps/place/The+Heeren/@1.3025948,103.8352472,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x31da199169636bb7:0x5404323300ccead7]]> Venue: Robinsons The Heeren, Personal Shoppers’ Room (Level 3) 260 Orchard Road Singapore 238855
